title: Ezukanma first Red Raider off the board in NFL Draft - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Ezukanma first Red Raider off the board in NFL Draft - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: Texas Tech wide receiver Erik Ezukanma became the first Red Raider to hear his name called in the 2022 NFL Draft on Saturday as he was selected with the 125th overall pick (fourth round) by the Miami Dolphins.
